archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Prioritize Service Problem
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process is responsible for assigning the prioritization to service problem in order to establish an order for managing it. The prioritization is assigned (usually automatically) according to criteria, such as, categorization, services affected and SLAs.

properties.value: This process is responsible for assigning the prioritization to service problem in order to establish an order for managing it. The prioritization is assigned (usually automatically) according to criteria, such as, categorization, services affected and SLAs.
